byline.contributor: Amy Chozick and Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By PETER BAKER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

abstract: Vice Pres Joe Biden says he will not run for president, concluding that he is too short on time to mount effective campaign; announcement ends long period of speculation and clears major obstacle to Hillary Rodham Clinton's bid for Democratic nomination.
lead_paragraph: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.’s announcement on Wednesday ended a three-month exploration that began after his eldest child’s death.

headline.main: Joe Biden Concludes There’s No Time for a 2016 Run
headline.print_headline: Biden Concludes There’s No Time for a 2016 Run

snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.’s announcement on Wednesday ended a three-month exploration that began after his eldest child’s death.
